resources.string: I am worthy of success and prosperity!
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive.
I deserve to be surrounded by people who love and respect me.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Negative thoughts only have the power I allow them.
You must have a level of discontent to feel the urge to want to grow.
There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
If it is important to you, you will find a way. If not, you’ll find an excuse.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.
I’m not stopping until I’m the best I can be.
As long as I put my mind to it, anything is possible.
I have a purpose. I might not know what it is yet, but I will eventually.
I\'ll hold my head up high despite what people say about me.
